summary:
Tired of uneffective armors ? Use this preset and true armor mod.
SAFE TO UNINSTALL IN MID-GAME, DON'T CHANGE VANILLA ARMOR RATING.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]WHAT IS THIS ?[/size][/b]
THIS A PRESET FOR [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89440]TRUE ARMOR[/url]﻿ MOD BY ANUBIS22, MADE THE ARMORS FROM THE GAME MORE REALISTIC, SEE A EXAMPLE  BELOW

[img]https://i.imgur.com/TpXOcBq.png[/img]
[size=3] ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿This is a new armor defense system, so this don't change the vanilla armor rating. :D

[/size] ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿Actually i have changed the the effeciency of vanilla armor rating to 10%, if you don't like, just put the slider for 100%.

﻿ ﻿    [img]https://i.imgur.com/pt18aOf.png[/img][color=red]
[/color]
[b]REQUIREMENT:
[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89440]True Armor[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48265/]FISS[/url]

[b]INSTALLATION AND UNISTALLATION INSTRUNCTIONS:[/b]

[size=3]Go to [b]Save/Load[/b] tab and click in [b]load custom settings[/b]
For safe [b]unistallation[/b] go to [b]save/load[/b] tab and click in [b]load blank[/b] settings, this deactive all config of true armor.[/size]

[b]RECOMMENDED MODS:

[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76529/]Wildcat[/url] [color=red][b][MUST HAVE][/b][/color]
 Put the difficulty equivalent like 1x1, 5x5 for more realism.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89438/]Simply Balanced[/url] [color=red][b][MUST HAVE][/b][/color]
The same creator of True Armor.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89035/]Equipment Durability System[/url] [color=red][b][MUST HAVE][/b][/color]
Or use [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55677]loot and degradation[/url].
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85138/]Improvement Names Customized - SKSE[/url] 
I'm using the preset with +1, +2, +3.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51024/]Honed Metal[/url] 
Blacksmith can craft items for you.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64088/]SOT Hardcore Encumbrance[/url] 
This mod will add encumbrance penalties in a more immersive and challenging way.


[b]FAQ:
UNARMED IT'S NOT LOOK REALISTIC
This is because creatures uses unarmed dmg, so i need to balance this *[/b]
[right][img]https://i.imgur.com/DyNu0Ej.png[/img][/right]
author: VolnuttFallout
